description: Select a single data from a list of data.

data_list.info: List of data to select from.

data_index.info: Index of the data to select.
data_index.info_with_range: Index of the data to select (0 to {max_index}, total: {length} items).
data_index.info_empty_list: Index of the data to select (list is empty).

success.data_selected: Successfully selected data at index {index} from {total} items

errors.empty_data_list: Data list is empty or not provided.
errors.invalid_data_list_type: Data list must be a list.
errors.index_out_of_range: Index {index} is out of range. Valid range: 0 to {max_index} (length: {length})
errors.invalid_selected_data_type: Item at index {index} is not a Data object. Found: {actual_type}
